animate

Description

When called, it add a class named 'animated' on element

Dependencies

  • $timeout

Usage

as attribute
<ANY animate="{string}"
     delay="{string}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
animatestring

a comma separated animate.css class names

(default: fadeIn)

delaystring

a comma separated durations list in milliseconds

(default: 1)

Example

Source
